item.description:
Confetti combines three generations of mediterranean heritage, the finest ingredients, prepares them to order, and presents them in a spacious facility with great style.  I have been here for business lunches and found that like most places some food is fantastic - especially the chef specialties and fish, some is good - very good if you like plain food, and some is same as anywhere else (mostly the "bar food").  Wait staff is usually professional, knowledgable and friendly unless you get a trainee.  "Taste of CT" week!  They will probably be quite busy so be prepared for a bit of a wait as usual with restaurants this week. 

Confetti's menu looks great, see the special $20.11 menu here: http://www.connecticutrestaurantweek.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Confettis-Restaurant-Week-Menu.pdf

It is also Ladies Night on Wednesdays: Gals receive a special Martini or house wine and a special dessert with the purchase of any entrée. 

Go to their website and check it out!  http://idineconfetti.com/

Please be sure to show up if you RSVP "YES".  (Must change your RSVP by 4:00pm 10/11/11 so I can confirm the # attending.)  I will collect $1.00 from each person to defray costs of Meetup. Groupons can not be used for CT Week menu or Ladies night specials and only one per table, so be prepared that if more than one shows up you will have to coin toss for priveledges. 

Let's eat and be merry! - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CONFETTI - 10/12/11 6:45pm
